segments.text: What was your duty like in your previous job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a team to make itineraries of the tour , evaluate the value of it for one tourist and recommend the routine for different tourists .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you name a few examples ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . There are selected itineraries for rich and high-tasted people , common routine for people who are on trade observation tour , and excursion routine for people who have limited time for sightseeing .
segments.speaker: S2
